[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/kv.rs] [Enum: Value] [Consensus secret leakage] If consensus round_manager.rs passes Vote or Block structures containing BLS signatures or validator private data to logging macros, can Value::Debug expose these secrets in plaintext logs? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/kv.rs] [Enum: Value] [Account credential leakage] If execution engine passes Move AccountResource or authentication keys to Value::from_debug(), can private keys or seed phrases leak through debug formatting? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/kv.rs] [Enum: Value] [Network peer information] Can IP addresses, peer identifiers, or network topology information logged via Value expose validator network infrastructure to attackers performing reconnaissance? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-logger/src/kv.rs] [Function: Value::from_display()] [Infinite formatting] If a Display implementation enters an infinite loop in its fmt() method, can this deadlock logging threads and prevent validators from logging consensus progress? (High)
